name: Chapped Brute
languages: understands one language but can't speak

traits.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The chapped brute has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing. While {@condition deafened}, the brute can't use its blindsight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The chapped brute makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.
